page.title: 11EVENTS IN AREA
page.content: A recent Sunday saw two major events in the area. At Flyford Flavell the village Social Committee organised an 'Open Day' when the public were invited to visit a number of activities in the village. The church was decorated with examples of old farming crafts and several local residents opened their gardens for displays of local art, pottery, engraving and cream teas. There were a reasonable number of visitors but as with all such summer events good weather is helpful and this day was dull and cool. On the same afternoon a parents and childrens Rounders and Barbecue event was held by Flyford Flavell School Parents Association on Flyford Flavell Cricket Ground. About 14O people attended and all enjoyed a happy family occasion.
